Thumbnail
private class Thumbnail.ThumbnailDragGestureListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.dnd.DragGestureListener, java.io.Serializable

This class extends a DragGestureListener and allows DnD on Thumbnails.

Method Detail

dragGestureRecognized

public void dragGestureRecognized(java.awt.dnd.DragGestureEvent event)
This method is invoked by the drag and drop framework. It signifies the start of a drag and drop operation. If the event is a copy or move we start the drag and create a Transferable.

Specified by:
dragGestureRecognized in interface java.awt.dnd.DragGestureListener
